data.title: Glassnode Looks at State of Bitcoin Amid ‘Extremely Quiet' On-Chain Activity
data.text: Blockchain analytics firm Glassnode is looking at the state of Bitcoin after the world's leading crypto by market cap launched a sudden rally starting over the weekend. In a new report, Glassnode says that one potentially bullish factor for Bitcoin is the growing number of wallet addresses receiving BTC, rather than sending it. “On the […] The post Glassnode Looks at State of Bitcoin Amid ‘Extremely Quiet' On-Chain Activity appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
